main.name: Gulnihal Naldoken
main.bio: An eager, junior full-stack developer who is ready to implement and develop existing technical and interpersonal skills. Adapted to managing all stages of the software life cycle without any background in coding when having lots of changes in my life. Proficient in building with React and applying database fundamental knowledge and I enjoy collaborating with colleagues to build multifaceted applications. I am keen on utilizing my strong communication and reasoning skills, including the ability to use my previous experience to ensure the quality of work.

education.description: Built-up soft skills and technical skills and gained the principals of self learning in the course. Experienced in Agile Software methods. Delivered various application including 'Development Planner App' for CodeYourFuture which enables graduates keeping track of their professional and personal developments and receiving feedback from their mentors

education.degree: BS & MS in Secondary School Science and Mathematics Education

work.title: Trainee FullStack Developer
work.description: Delivered projects based on Javascript, React, Node and PostgreSQL and worked in an agile team. Learned Material UI to build user friendly applications and fetching data with Axios to integrate backend and frontend. Provided security with JWT for authorisation when users logged in. I adapted to the agile methodologies in a short time at CYF by using my past experience developing and managing projects for NGOâ€™s as a volunteer of 7 years. Contributed to Pasta La Vista team creating React components, building sign up authentication using Git / GitHub and structuring the database for our final project. I experienced working with a Product Manager and tech leader as well as having meetings with the Product Owner and finally presented this project to a developer community with my team in person on the North West Class 4 Demo day.

work.title: Physical Science Teacher
work.description: Taught physics and chemistry from grade 8 to 10 (ages 14 to 16)), managed grade 8s as their class teacher. Successfully implemented the use of interactive science materials. Provided weekly one-one-one meetings with students to track their progress by collaborating with school counsellor and parents. Mentored students for ESKOM/EXPO science fair.

work.company: The Ministry of Work & Social Security
work.title: Data Preparation and Control Operator
work.description: Managed the data saving tools provided by the ministry. Checked the data according to the ministry standards. Managed the archive of the laboratory test results and office documents. Documented the office outcomes.
